modShortDescription: Its time for a colorful fluffy puffy fancy Prefab! The girls wanted some kind of unicorn in the game, so i tried to build my first sculpture prefab.
modDescription:
Hy to all crazy Zombiekillers out there,  
its time for a colorful fluffy puffy fancy Prefab!

At first it was a crazy idea in the german facebook communty, but the girls wanted some kind of unicorn in the game, so i tried to build my first sculpture [prefab](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-prefab/).

Its a fun project but it came out a lot better than we thought! You can see it in the screenshots. It looks crazy and funny to have this in the game.

Its a Multi-Trader with all 5 different [Trader](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) inside the Unicorn.

Lets get a fluffy pink unicorn into your apocalypseâ€¦ yours Shema / German 7 Days FB Community / 7dtdger

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nLwDoIiOxhl79QhZzPuEpLrtkrIPu3Oy/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** Shema
